markdownRemark.html:
Provided web development consulting for clients on business solutions such as websites, web forms, branding, customer service and online services using various CMS systems such as Wordpress, Wix, Yola and more.

Built custom web applications based on client requirements utilizing frameworks such as React and Redux.

Ensure all web site development follows W3C web standards and AODA compliance for accessibility and other good practices for web design and development.
